actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to modify the River and Harbor Act of 1886 to authorize Corps of Engineer authority over an extended portion of the Clinton River.

summary.text: Modifies the Clinton River, Michigan, navigation project to extend the eight foot deep, fifty foot wide navigation channel approximately two miles upstream from the Cass Avenue bridge to the Gratiot Avenue bridge.

titles.title: A bill to modify the River and Harbor Act of 1886 to authorize Corps of Engineer authority over an extended portion of the Clinton River.
